about.title: About Dr. Maged
about.description: Dr. Maged Adly is a board-certified ophthalmologist with over 15 years of experience in diagnosing and treating various eye conditions. He specializes in advanced surgical procedures and comprehensive vision care.
qualifications: Doctorate of Medicine and Ophthalmic Surgery – Ain Shams University
Fellow of the Royal College of Surgeons – Glasgow, UK
Fellow of the International Council of Ophthalmology – Cambridge, UK
Consultant in Ophthalmology and Eye Surgery at the Research Institute of Ophthalmology, Giza

items.title: Ophthalmic Surgery
items.description: Specialized surgeries for various eye conditions and diseases

items.title: Cataract Surgery
items.description: Advanced treatment for cataracts, including lens replacement

items.title: Glaucoma Treatment
items.description: Diagnosis and management of increased intraocular pressure

items.title: Retina and Vitreous Care
items.description: Comprehensive care for retinal diseases and disorders
